Description: Unsealed frame containing over 50 fragments of a Book of the Dead with monochrome vignettes and hieratic in black and red ink. The fragments are laid on paper, unattached to the glass. A label reads 'Checked Nov 80'; the frame and mounting is identical to 76417.
Curator's comments: Previously unregistered material located on the counter in the papyrus store until 2000. Provenance unrecorded.
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fragmentary, loose Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (heavy and unsuitable) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
